post:
Here's our latest offer from Front Range Hosting.

We recently finished 7th on the Quarterly hosts poll, our first time appearing on the poll :)  


We offer a 7 day money back guarantee and have thousands of satisfied customers.  http://www.serchen.com/company/front-range-hosting/


Pricing on 4 plans below are inclusive of the FRH25 code.

Memory Format is as follows:  Dedicated/Burst/vSwap

**REMEMBER! Prices are discounted after you click "Add to Cart"**

**OpenVZ Plans**

128M/256M/128M 5G Disk 250G Xfer 1.50/mo [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=16&promocode=FRH25)

256M/512M/256M 10G Disk 500G Xfer 3.00/mo With Code LEB50  [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=18&promocode=FRH25)

384M/768M/384M 15G Disk 750G Xfer 4.50/mo With Code LEB50 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=34&promocode=FRH25)

512M/1024M/512M 20G Disk 1TB Xfer 6.00/mo With Code LEB50 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=19&promocode=FRH25)


[Larger OpenVZ Plans Available](http://www.frontrangehosting.com/vps.php) All plans are 25% off with FRH25 and you can upgrade anytime and keep your discount!


**KVM Plans** **D Plans Have Increased Disk Space**
KVM-256D 256MB RAM, 4 vCPU 15GB SSD Cached Disk 256GB Transfer 4.50/mo with KVM25 [Direct Signup Link](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=43&promocode=KVM25)
KVM-384D 384MB RAM, 4 vCPU 22GB SSD Cached Disk 384GB Transfer 6.75/mo with KVM25 [Direct Signup Link](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=45&promocode=KVM25)
KVM-512D 512MB RAM, 4 vCPU 30GB SSD Cached Disk, 512GB Transfer 7.00/mo with 5127D [Direct Signup Link](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=46&promocode=5127D)

Larger plans available KVM25 discount works on them all.

We also offer Server Monitoring with checks from 3 US locations keep an eye on your servers with us or anywhere else!

5 Checks from 3 US locations every 5 minutes for 1.00/mo  Some services would charge .60 for 1 check from 3 locations.
5 Checks from 3 US locations every 1 minutes for 2.00/mo
10 Checks @5Min 3Loc 2.00/mo
10 Checks @1Min 3Loc 4.00/mo

We can scale that as well into larger plans just talk to sales.

You can see the Server Monitoring Plans at http://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?gid=12




**All Plans Feature**
24x7x365.25 Support, were even here for leap seconds!
SSD Accelerated Nodes
Gigabit Nodes

Native IPv6
Fast 24 Core Intel Xeon Nodes
ASN 54856/We Own our OWN IP Addresses!
